attributes.action: sponsor legislation to prohibit the publication of asking prices on residential houses in England and Wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The value of anything for sale is the price which a willing buyer and a willing seller agree with each other. The advertising of asking prices in house sales leads to the artificial and excessive inflation of house prices which in turn leads to ruinous market corrections such as the one we are currently experiencing. To prevent future hardship, asking prices should not be made public.
